text: Exocarpos gaudichaudii (also called Gaudichaud's exocarpus or hulumoa) is a species of plant in the Santalaceae family. It is endemic to Hawaii. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== gaudichaudii Category:Endangered plants Category:Endemic flora of Hawaii Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Exocarpos gaudichaudii
